description: Defines a custom Flutter widget 'TvButtonOutline' for an outlined secondary button with focus and hover effects, designed for TV interfaces.

classes.name: TvButtonOutline
classes.description: A stateless widget representing an outlined button with focus, hover, and press interactions for TV UI.

classes.name: _TvButtonOutlineState
classes.description: State class managing the visual and interaction states of TvButtonOutline, including focus, hover, and pressed states.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the TvButtonOutline widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the button, handling focus, hover, tap, and visual styling.
